title: Choose the correct HTML element for the largest heading:

What is the purpose of the HTML <meta> tag?
answer_1: To define a metadata element for a web page
answer_3: To specify the main content of the page
right_answer: To define a metadata element for a web page

title: Which HTML tag is used for inserting a line break?

answer_1: To define the main content of the page

right_answer: To specify the page title and include metadata
